text:
You don’t have to say “loved” you still love the dog. The dog is just dead now. It’s ok to love someone that’s no longer here. I’m sorry for the loss of your friend. 

& that guy sucks. There are nicer men out there. They exist.

The one I believe she is thinking of, the character looks like Predator, shoots bombs, levitates, is yellow, has dreads? I think it’s a ps3 game. 

Like Cyrax but a girl?
